author: Mahita Gajanan
title: GOP Congressman: Amid Pandemic, Choose American ‘Way of Life’ Over American Lives
description: Restarting the U.S. economy is more important than ensuring Americans stay home to prevent more deaths from coronavirus, says a GOP congressman from Indiana in no uncertain terms. “It is policymakers’ decision to put on our big boy and big girl pants and say …
content:
Restarting the U.S. economy is more important than ensuring Americans stay home to prevent more deaths from coronavirus, says a GOP congressman from Indiana in no uncertain terms.
